text: "Speaking Moistly" is a remix song of a speech by Canadian prime minister Justin Trudeau. The song was edited by Brock Tyler, known on YouTube as anonymotif. The song uses Trudeau's words from a discussion with the media about the COVID-19 pandemic in Canada. The quote "speaking moistly" means respiratory droplets that go out the mouth when someone speaks. These can sometimes spread COVID-19. == References == Category:2020 songs Category:COVID-19 pandemic Category:Internet culture
title: Speaking Moistly
